ai-thag16.6:1.2_0: you’re radiant, handsome, lovely to behold;
ai-thag16.6:1.4_0: with teeth so white; you’re strong.
ai-thag16.6:2.3_0: are all found on your body:
ai-thag16.6:3.1_0: Your eyes are clear, your face is fair,
ai-thag16.6:3.3_0: In the midst of the Saṅgha of ascetics,
ai-thag16.6:4.1_0: You’re a mendicant fine to see,
ai-thag16.6:4.4_0: what do you want with the ascetic life?
ai-thag16.6:5.1_0: You’re fit to be a king,
ai-thag16.6:5.2_0: a wheel-turning monarch, chief of charioteers,
ai-thag16.6:6.2_0: The life of a man is cut off.
ai-thag16.6:6.4_0: as king of kings, lord of men!”
ai-thag16.6:7.3_0: the supreme king of the teaching.
ai-thag16.6:7.4_0: By the teaching I roll forth the wheel
ai-thag16.6:8.3_0: the supreme king of the teaching.
ai-thag16.6:9.2_0: the disciple who follows the Teacher’s way?
ai-thag16.6:9.4_0: of the teaching you rolled forth?”
ai-thag16.6:10.1_0: “By me the wheel was rolled forth,”
ai-thag16.6:10.4_0: Sāriputta, taking after the Realized One,
ai-thag16.6:11.1_0: I have known what should be known,
ai-thag16.6:11.2_0: and developed what should be developed,
ai-thag16.6:11.3_0: and given up what should be given up:
ai-thag16.6:11.4_0: and so, brahmin, I am a Buddha.
ai-thag16.6:13.1_0: For those in the world who are rare in the world,
ai-thag16.6:13.3_0: one of those whose appearance in the world
ai-thag16.6:15.4_0: roars like a lion in the jungle.
ai-thag16.6:16.3_0: who would not be inspired by him,
ai-thag16.6:17.1_0: Those who wish may follow me;
ai-thag16.6:17.3_0: Right here, I’ll go forth in the presence of him,
ai-thag16.6:17.4_0: this man of such splendid wisdom.”
ai-thag16.6:18.1_0: “In that case the intention of others.
ai-thag16.6:18.3_0: we’ll also go forth in the presence of him,
ai-thag16.6:18.4_0: this man of such splendid wisdom.”
ai-thag16.6:19.2_0: with joined palms held up, ask:
ai-thag16.6:20.3_0: it is visible, not subject to time,
ai-thag16.6:20.4_0: Here the going forth isn’t in vain
ai-thag16.6:20.5_0: for one who trains with diligence.”
ai-thag16.6:21.2_0: we went for refuge, O seer.
ai-thag16.6:21.3_0: In these seven days, Blessed One,
ai-thag16.6:21.4_0: we’ve become tamed in your teaching.
ai-thag16.6:22.1_0: You are the Buddha, you are the Teacher,
ai-thag16.6:22.3_0: you have cut off the underlying tendencies,
ai-thag16.6:23.3_0: by not grasping, like a lion,
ai-thag16.6:23.4_0: with fear and dread given up.
ai-thag16.6:24.3_0: Stretch out your feet, great hero:
ai-thag16.6:24.4_0: let these giants worship the Teacher.”
